alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 12:19PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Morgan and northwestern Johnson Counties through 1245 PM EST... At 1219 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florress, or near West Liberty, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dingus, Silverhill and Jeptha around 1225 PM EST. Mima, Ophir and Moon around 1230 PM EST. Gillem Branch, Relief, Redbush and Elna around 1235 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Keaton, Barnrock, Flatgap and Winifred. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
